New Records: Virat Kohli equalled Rohit Sharma's record for the most number of fifty-plus scores in T20I cricket with his 31st fifty.
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli hit a 44-ball 59 not out as India posted 192 for 2 in 20 overs against Hong Kong.
Kohli and Suryakumar Yadav stitched a 98-run stand in just 7 overs.
Suryakumar Yadav scored a 26-ball 68, hitting 6 sixes and as many boundaries, including 4 sixes in the final over.
